Name: Das Balkonzimmer
About the game: Discover the balcony room in a completely new 3D world. Move with your unique character. Discover the expanse of the balcony room, its facets and niches. Shoot with your gun and move the objects through the game's physics! Fling them off the balcony or across the room, whatever you want! You can experience the game in first person as well as in third person, depending on your wishes.
